document.full_text: the operator of the nuclear power plant at the center of a radiation scare after being disabled by japan's earthquake and tsunami confirmed tuesday that there had been meltdowns of fuel rods at three of its reactors.
document.title: tepco confirms meltdowns at 2 more fukushima reactors
lines_and_colors: the operator of the nuclear power plant at the center of a radiation scare after being disabled by japan's earthquake and tsunami confirmed tuesday that there had been meltdowns of fuel rods at three of its reactors.
